39 #include <cmath>
40 #include "CivilTime.hpp"

43 namespace gpstk

46  const char * CivilTime::MonthNames[] =
47  {
48  "Error",
49  "January","February", "March", "April",
50  "May", "June","July", "August",
51  "September", "October", "November", "December"
52  };
53 
55  const char * CivilTime::MonthAbbrevNames[] =
56  {
57  "err", "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun",
58  "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec"
59  };

61  CivilTime& CivilTime::operator=( const CivilTime& right )
62  {
63  year = right.year;
64  month = right.month;
65  day = right.day;
66  hour = right.hour;
67  minute = right.minute;
68  second = right.second;
69  timeSystem = right.timeSystem;
70  return *this;
71  }
72 
73  CommonTime CivilTime::convertToCommonTime() const
74  {
75  try
76  {
77  // get the julian day
78  long jday = convertCalendarToJD( year, month, day );
79  // get the second of day
80  double sod = convertTimeToSOD( hour, minute, second );
81  // make a CommonTime with jd, whole sod, and
82  // fractional second of day
83  CommonTime ct;
84  return ct.set( jday, static_cast<long>(sod) ,
85  (sod - static_cast<long>(sod)),
86  timeSystem );
87  }
88  catch (InvalidParameter& ip)
89  {
90  InvalidRequest ir(ip);
91  GPSTK_THROW(ir);
92  }
93  }
94 
95  void CivilTime::convertFromCommonTime( const CommonTime& ct )
96  {
97  long jday, sod;
98  double fsod;
99  // get the julian day, second of day, and fractional second of day
100  ct.get( jday, sod, fsod, timeSystem );
101  // convert the julian day to calendar "year/month/day of month"
102  convertJDtoCalendar( jday, year, month, day );
103  // convert the (whole) second of day to "hour/minute/second"
104  convertSODtoTime( static_cast<double>( sod ), hour, minute, second );
105  // add the fractional second of day to "second"
106  second += fsod;
107  }
108 
109  std::string CivilTime::printf( const std::string& fmt ) const
110  {
111  try
112  {
113  using gpstk::StringUtils::formattedPrint;
114  std::string rv = fmt;
115 
116  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "Y",
117  "Yd", year );
118  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "y",
119  "yd", static_cast<short>( year % 100 ) );
120  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "m",
121  "mu", month );
122  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "b",
123  "bs", MonthAbbrevNames[month] );
124  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "B",
125  "Bs", MonthNames[month] );
126  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "d",
127  "du", day );
128  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "H",
129  "Hu", hour );
130  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "M",
131  "Mu", minute );
132  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "S",
133  "Su", static_cast<short>( second ) );
134  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixFloat() + "f",
135  "ff", second );
136  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "P",
137  "Ps", timeSystem.asString().c_str() );
138  return rv;
139  }
140  catch( gpstk::StringUtils::StringException& exc )
141  {
142  GPSTK_RETHROW( exc );
143  }
144  }
145 
146  std::string CivilTime::printError( const std::string& fmt) const
147  {
148  try
149  {
150  using gpstk::StringUtils::formattedPrint;
151  std::string rv = fmt;
152 
153  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "Y",
154  "Ys", getError().c_str() );
155  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "y",
156  "ys", getError().c_str() );
157  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "m",
158  "ms", getError().c_str() );
159  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "b",
160  "bs", getError().c_str() );
161  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "B",
162  "Bs", getError().c_str() );
163  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "d",
164  "ds", getError().c_str() );
165  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "H",
166  "Hs", getError().c_str() );
167  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "M",
168  "Ms", getError().c_str() );
169  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "S",
170  "Ss", getError().c_str() );
171  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixFloat() + "f",
172  "fs", getError().c_str() );
173  rv = formattedPrint( rv, getFormatPrefixInt() + "P",
174  "Ps", getError().c_str() );
175  return rv;
176  }
177  catch( gpstk::StringUtils::StringException& exc )
178  {
179  GPSTK_RETHROW( exc );
180  }
181  }
182 
183  bool CivilTime::setFromInfo( const IdToValue& info )
184  {
185  using namespace gpstk::StringUtils;
186 
187  for( IdToValue::const_iterator i = info.begin(); i != info.end(); i++ )
188  {
189  switch( i->first )
190  {
191  case 'Y':
192  year = asInt( i->second );
193  break;
194 
195  case 'y':
196  switch( i->second.length() )
197  {
198  case 2:
199  year = asInt( i->second ) + 1900;
200  if( year < 1980 )
201  year += 100;
202  break;
203  case 3:
204  year = asInt( i->second ) + 1000;
205  if( year < 1980 )
206  year += 100;
207  break;
208  default:
209  year = asInt( i->second );
210  break;
211  };
212  break;
213 
214  case 'm':
215  month = asInt( i->second );
216  break;
217 
218  case 'b':
219  case 'B':
220  {
221  std::string thisMonth( i->second );
222  lowerCase(thisMonth);
223 
224  if (isLike(thisMonth, "jan.*")) month = 1;
225  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "feb.*")) month = 2;
226  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "mar.*")) month = 3;
227  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "apr.*")) month = 4;
228  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "may.*")) month = 5;
229  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "jun.*")) month = 6;
230  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "jul.*")) month = 7;
231  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "aug.*")) month = 8;
232  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "sep.*")) month = 9;
233  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "oct.*")) month = 10;
234  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "nov.*")) month = 11;
235  else if (isLike(thisMonth, "dec.*")) month = 12;
236  else
237  {
238  return false;
239  }
240  }
241  break;
242 
243  case 'd':
244  day = asInt( i->second );
245  break;
246 
247  case 'H':
248  hour = asInt( i->second );
249  break;
250 
251  case 'M':
252  minute = asInt( i->second );
253  break;
254 
255  case 'S':
256  case 'f':
257  second = asDouble( i->second );
258  if (i->first == 'S')
259  second = floor(second);
260  break;
261 
262  case 'P':
263  timeSystem.fromString(i->second);
264  break;
265 
266  default:
267  // do nothing
268  break;
269  };
270  }
271 
272  return true;
273  }
274 
275  bool CivilTime::isValid() const
276  {
277  CivilTime temp;
278  temp.convertFromCommonTime( convertToCommonTime() );
279  if( *this == temp )
280  {
281  return true;
282  }
283  return false;
284  }
285 
286  void CivilTime::reset()
287  {
288  year = 0;
289  month = day = 1;
290  hour = minute = 0;
291  second = 0.0;
292  timeSystem = TimeSystem::Unknown;
293  }
294 
295  bool CivilTime::operator==( const CivilTime& right ) const
296  {
298  if ((timeSystem != TimeSystem::Any &&
299  right.timeSystem != TimeSystem::Any) &&
300  timeSystem != right.timeSystem)
301  return false;
302 
303  if( year == right.year &&
304  month == right.month &&
305  day == right.day &&
306  hour == right.hour &&
307  minute == right.minute &&
308  fabs(second - right.second) < CommonTime::eps )
309  {
310  return true;
311  }
312  return false;
313  }
314 
315  bool CivilTime::operator!=( const CivilTime& right ) const
316  {
317  return ( !operator==( right ) );
318  }
319 
320  bool CivilTime::operator<( const CivilTime& right ) const
321  {
323  if ((timeSystem != TimeSystem::Any &&
324  right.timeSystem != TimeSystem::Any) &&
325  timeSystem != right.timeSystem)
326  {
327  gpstk::InvalidRequest ir("CommonTime objects not in same time system, cannot be compared");
328  GPSTK_THROW(ir);
329  }
330 
331  if( year < right.year )
332  {
333  return true;
334  }
335  if( year > right.year )
336  {
337  return false;
338  }
339  if( month < right.month )
340  {
341  return true;
342  }
343  if( month > right.month )
344  {
345  return false;
346  }
347  if( day < right.day )
348  {
349  return true;
350  }
351  if( day > right.day )
352  {
353  return false;
354  }
355  if( hour < right.hour )
356  {
357  return true;
358  }
359  if( hour > right.hour )
360  {
361  return false;
362  }
363  if( minute < right.minute )
364  {
365  return true;
366  }
367  if( minute > right.minute )
368  {
369  return false;
370  }
371  if( second < right.second )
372  {
373  return true;
374  }
375 
376  return false;
377  }
378 
379  bool CivilTime::operator>( const CivilTime& right ) const
380  {
381  return ( !operator<=( right ) );
382  }
383 
384  bool CivilTime::operator<=( const CivilTime& right ) const
385  {
386  return ( operator<( right ) || operator==( right ) );
387  }
388 
389  bool CivilTime::operator>=( const CivilTime& right ) const
390  {
391  return ( !operator<( right ) );
392  }
393 
394  // ----------- CivilTime operator<< --------------
395  //
396  // Stream output for CivilTime objects. Typically used for debugging.
397  // @param s stream to append formatted CivilTime to.
398  // @param cit CivilTime to append to stream \c s.
399  // @return reference to \c s.
400 
401  std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& s,
402  const CivilTime& cit )
403  {
404  s << cit.printf("%02m/%02d/%04Y %02H:%02M:%02S %P");
405  return s;
406  }
